text: Cole Turner (born July 7, 2001) is an American soccer player who plays for Philadelphia Union in Major League Soccer. ==Playing career== ===Youth=== Turner began his youth career playing in the greater Baltimore region for Baltimore Celtic and Baltimore Bays. In 2015, he joined the Philadelphia Union YSC Academy beginning at the U-14 level. As an academy player, Turner made multiple appearances for the Union's USL Championship side, Bethlehem Steel during the 2019 season. In February 2018, Cole verbally committed to playing college soccer at the United States Naval Academy. ===Club=== ====Philadelphia Union==== Despite the commitment to join the Naval Academy, on July 17, 2019, it was announced that Turner signed a pre-contract with Philadelphia Union as a homegrown player, and immediately with Bethlehem Steel FC for the remainder of the 2019 season. Turner became an official member of the first team on January 1, 2020. Turner made his debut for the Union on September 20 against Montreal Impact. == References == == External links == * Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:American soccer players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Homegrown Players (MLS) Category:Philadelphia Union II players Category:People from Harford County, Maryland Category:Philadelphia Union players Category:Soccer players from Maryland Category:Sportspeople from the Baltimore metropolitan area Category:USL Championship players
title: Cole Turner (soccer)
